data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 516 believers in the state of Dubrovacko-Neretvanska.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dubrovacko-Neretvanska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Dubrovacko-Neretvanska, Croatia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 237 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Dubrovacko-Neretvanska.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Dubrovacko-Neretvanska.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Croatian-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, grace the churches in Dubrovacko-Neretvanska, Croatia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 112,572 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dubrovacko-Neretvanska, Croatia has a population of 122,500.

We estimate Dubrovacko-Neretvanska has 516 people who might know Jesus, 112,572 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,412 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 237 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Dubrovacko-Neretvanska, Croatia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
